mapper.select: SELECT YEAR(pd.program_date) year, MONTH(pd.program_date) month, DAY(pd.program_date) day, COUNT(pr.program_date_no) cnt, p.program_max_customer programMaxCustomer, p.program_name programName, pd.program_date_no programDateNo FROM program_reservation pr RIGHT OUTER JOIN program_date pd on pr.program_date_no = pd.program_date_no INNER JOIN program p on p.program_no = pd.program_no WHERE YEAR(pd.program_date) = #{year} AND MONTH(pd.program_date) = #{month} GROUP BY pd.program_date_no ORDER BY pd.program_date ASC

SELECT YEAR(pd.program_date) year, MONTH(pd.program_date) month, DAY(pd.program_date) day, COUNT(pr.program_date_no) cnt, p.program_max_customer programMaxCustomer, p.program_name programName FROM program_reservation pr RIGHT OUTER JOIN program_date pd on pr.program_date_no = pd.program_date_no INNER JOIN program p on p.program_no = pd.program_no GROUP BY pd.program_date ORDER BY pd.program_date ASC

SELECT YEAR(pd.program_date) year, MONTH(pd.program_date) month, DAY(pd.program_date) day, COUNT(pr.program_date_no) cnt, p.program_max_customer programMaxCustomer, p.program_name programName, pd.program_date_no programDateNo FROM program_reservation pr RIGHT OUTER JOIN program_date pd on pr.program_date_no = pd.program_date_no INNER JOIN program p on p.program_no = pd.program_no WHERE YEAR(pd.program_date) = #{year} AND MONTH(pd.program_date) = #{month} AND DAY(pd.program_date) >= #{thisDay} GROUP BY pd.program_date_no ORDER BY pd.program_date ASC LIMIT #{beginRow},#{rowPerPage};

SELECT COUNT(*) FROM program_date pd INNER JOIN program p on pd.program_no = p.program_no WHERE YEAR(pd.program_date) = #{year} AND MONTH(pd.program_date) = #{month} AND DAY(pd.program_date) >= #{thisDay} GROUP BY MONTH(pd.program_date)

SELECT DAY(pd.program_date) day, pd.program_date_no programDateNo FROM program_reservation pr RIGHT OUTER JOIN program_date pd on pr.program_date_no = pd.program_date_no INNER JOIN payment p on pr.payment_no = p.payment_no WHERE YEAR(pd.program_date) = #{year} AND MONTH(pd.program_date) = #{month} AND p.customer_no = #{customerNo} GROUP BY pd.program_date ORDER BY pd.program_date ASC
SELECT pr.branch_no branchNo FROM program_reservation pr INNER JOIN payment p ON pr.payment_no = p.payment_no WHERE pr.program_date_no = #{programDateNo} AND p.customer_no = #{customerNo}
SELECT branch_name branchName, branch_no branchNo FROM branch WHERE branch_name != '본점';
SELECT customer_id customerId FROM customer WHERE customer_no = #{customerNo}

SELECT YEAR(p.payment_date) year, MONTH(p.payment_date) month, DAY(p.payment_date) day, m.membership_month membershipMonth, p.payment_no paymentNo FROM payment p INNER JOIN membership m ON p.membership_no = m.membership_no WHERE p.customer_no = #{customerNo} AND p.active = 'N';
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO program_reservation(payment_no, program_date_no, branch_no, program_reservation_date) VALUES(#{paymentNo}, #{programDateNo}, #{branchNo}, NOW());
mapper.select: SELECT YEAR(pd.program_date) year, MONTH(pd.program_date) month, DAY(pd.program_date) day, pg.program_name programName, b.branch_name branchName, pr.program_reservation_no programReservationNo FROM program_reservation pr INNER JOIN payment p ON pr.payment_no = p.payment_no INNER JOIN program_date pd ON pr.program_date_no = pd.program_date_no INNER JOIN program pg ON pd.program_no = pg.program_no INNER JOIN branch b ON pr.branch_no = b.branch_no WHERE p.customer_no = #{customerNo};
SELECT review_no FROM review WHERE program_reservation_no = #{programReservationNo};
